about_the_game: Travel to Honeywood with "Echoes of the Plum Grove" OST by Magabes & Ian Ketterer of BleepBloop Audio. 77 tracks capture the serene and seasonal life. Blending traditional instruments to create the feeling of farming, the cozy warmth of a fireplace in winter, to a bustling sunny market day in town.
detailed_description:
Check out Echoes of the Plum Grove!


About the Game

Travel to Honeywood with "Echoes of the Plum Grove" OST by Magabes & Ian Ketterer of BleepBloop Audio. 77 tracks capture the serene and seasonal life. Blending traditional instruments to create the feeling of farming, the cozy warmth of a fireplace in winter, to a bustling sunny market day in town.
